ygData.subject: Versioning
ygData.msgSnippet: What do people consider best practices for versioning of RESTful web services? There seem to be two common approaches: stuff the versions into the URI

What do people consider best practices for versioning of RESTful web servic=
es? There seem to be two common approaches: stuff the versions into the URI=
 somewhere and version the media types and use content negotiation. What ar=
e the pros and cons of each approach?
